modName: Remove Flame Trails From Flame Atronachs
summary: The Flame Trail that the Flame Atronachs leave behind is cool and all... but I\'ve noticed that it doesn\'t stay in place as the atronach moves. In other words the trail moves out of place when it should be fixed to the ground and this bothers me. So I removed it.
descriptionHtml: The Flame Trail that the Flame Atronachs leave behind  is cool and all... but I\'ve noticed that it doesn\'t stay in place as the atronach moves. In other words the trail moves out of place when it should be fixed to the ground and this bothers me. So I removed it.
author: striarii
